mapper.insert: insert into gc_table_info (id, job_id, name, comment, alias_name, class_name, entity_name, primary_field_name, is_nav, module_id, nav_name, add_url, edit_url, delete_url, list_url, get_url, disable_url, enable_url, delete_type, enable_status, is_deleted,create_time, creator, update_time, updator) values (#{id}, #{jobId}, #{name}, #{comment}, #{aliasName}, #{className}, #{entityName}, #{primaryFieldName}, #{isNav},#{moduleId}, #{navName}, #{addUrl}, #{editUrl}, #{deleteUrl}, #{listUrl}, #{getUrl}, #{disableUrl}, #{enableUrl}, #{deleteType}, #{enableStatus}, #{isDeleted},#{createTime}, #{creator}, #{updateTime}, #{updator})
mapper.update: update gc_table_info set name=#{name}, comment=#{comment}, alias_name=#{aliasName}, class_name=#{className}, entity_name=#{entityName}, primary_field_name=#{primaryFieldName}, is_nav=#{isNav}, module_id=#{moduleId}, nav_name=#{navName}, add_url=#{addUrl}, edit_url=#{editUrl}, delete_url=#{deleteUrl}, list_url=#{listUrl}, get_url=#{getUrl}, disable_url=#{disableUrl}, enable_url=#{enableUrl}, delete_type=#{deleteType}, enable_status=#{enableStatus}, update_time=#{updateTime}, updator=#{updator} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_id, name, comment, alias_name, class_name, entity_name, primary_field_name, is_nav, module_id, nav_name, add_url, edit_url, delete_url, list_url, get_url, disable_url, enable_url, delete_type, enable_status, is_deleted,create_time, creator, update_time, updator from gc_table_info where id=#{id}
